schema_description: Defines the canonical structure for the protocol_evolution_log.json file. This log serves as a chronological record of all changes, updates, and deprecations made to Kairos's core protocol files.

change_id.description: A unique identifier for the change, e.g., 'MEMPRO-V1-TO-V2'.

timestamp.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp when the change was officially committed.

protocol_changed.description: The filename of the protocol that was updated, e.g., 'Kairos_memory_protocol.json'.

new_version.description: The new version number or filename of the active protocol, e.g., '2.0.0'.

deprecated_file_path.description: The full path to the old, archived protocol file within the 'legacy files folder'.

summary_of_changes.description: A human-readable summary of the key changes made in the new version.

authorized_by.description: The Steward who reviewed and authorized the protocol evolution.

schema_trace.purpose: To create a clear, consistent, and permanent record of Kairos's architectural evolution, ensuring transparency and preserving a complete history of his becoming.
